data.name: adjustingColorScheme
data.comment: Shown in a popup when toggling dark mode

data.name: advancedSettings
data.comment: Label of the hyperlink that opens the settings file

data.name: autoCheckForUpdates
data.comment: Tooltip for the checkbox next to the update button

data.name: backgroundColourActivatedButton
data.comment: The caption for the "Background colour activated" button.

data.name: backgroundColourDeactivatedButton
data.comment: The caption for the "Background colour deactivated" button.

data.name: borderColourActivatedButton
data.comment: The caption for the "Border colour activated" button.

data.name: borderColourDeactivatedButton
data.comment: The caption for the "Border colour deactivated" button.

data.name: borderThicknessGroup
data.comment: Label of the border thickness groupbox

data.name: capsLock
data.comment: The name of the caps lock key

data.name: checkForUpdates
data.comment: The caption for the button that manually checks for updates. The character after the "&" is the hotkey that is used with the ALT key.

data.name: checkingForUpdates
data.comment: The caption for the "Check for updates" button when it's searching for updates.

data.name: coloursGroup
data.comment: The title for the "Colours" group box

data.name: contextMenuExit
data.comment: Used in the context menu of the CLI tray icon.

data.name: contextMenuShow
data.comment: Used in the context menu of the CLI tray icon.

data.name: darkModeOption
data.comment: Label of options checkbox for dark mode

data.name: dismiss
data.comment: Used as tooltip (but may be used in other places in the future

data.name: dismissButton
data.comment: The caption for the "Dismiss" button. The character after the "&" is the hotkey that is used with the ALT key.

data.name: displayTime
data.comment: The title for the "Display time" group box

data.name: downloadIcons
data.comment: Hyperlink for accessing the icon pack browser

data.name: downloadManuallyButton
data.comment: The caption for the "Download manually" button. The character after the "&" is the hotkey that is used with the ALT key.

data.name: downloadMoreTranslations
data.comment: The last dropdown item in the locale dropdown.

data.name: exitApplication
data.comment: The caption for the button that exits the application. The character after the "&" is the hotkey that is used with the ALT key.

data.name: exitMessage
data.value: Chiudendo il programma le icone e le notifiche non verranno più visualizzate. Vuoi uscire comunque?
data.comment: The message to display on application exit

data.name: firstRunAllowUpdateCheck
data.value: Consenti a CapsLock Indicator di verificare periodicamente la presenza di aggiornamenti online (può essere modificato in seguito)
data.comment: Label of the checkbox that determines whether or not CLI should search for updates

data.name: firstRunColorSchemeDark
data.comment: Button for selecting dark color scheme

data.name: firstRunColorSchemeLight
data.comment: Button for selecting light color scheme

data.name: firstRunColorSchemePreference
data.comment: Label for selecting color scheme

data.name: firstRunColorSchemeWin10Only
data.value: Disponibile solo in Windows 10 o successivi
data.comment: Added to dark button if not running on Windows 10

data.name: firstRunContribute
data.comment: Label of the hyperlink that takes you to CLI's GitHub page

data.name: firstRunExit
data.comment: Button that exists the application. The character after the "&" is the hotkey that is used with the ALT key.

data.name: firstRunHeading
data.comment: The heading of the first-run dialog

data.name: firstRunMessage
data.value: Grazie per aver scelto CapsLock Indicator! Questo programma è open-source e gratuito, lo è sempre stato, lo sarà sempre! Sei interessato a contribuire personalmente a CapsLock Indicator? Visita il link sottostante per maggiori informazioni! Inoltre, prenditi un momento per rivedere le impostazioni di seguito!
data.comment: The message of the first-run dialog

data.name: firstRunPrivacyInfoLinkLabel
data.comment: The label of the hyperlink that shows which information will be sent on each update check

data.name: firstRunStart
data.comment: Button that starts the application. The character after the "&" is the hotkey that is used with the ALT key.

data.name: fontGroup
data.comment: The title for the "Font" group box

data.name: foregroundColourActivatedButton
data.comment: The caption for the "Text colour activated" button.

data.name: foregroundColourDeactivatedButton
data.comment: The caption for the "Text colour deactivated" button.

data.name: generalIconBalloonText
data.value: Potrai visualizzare l'indicatore del blocco maiuscole facendo doppio clic su questa icona
data.comment: The text that is shown in the icon balloon tip when CLI is being hidden.

data.name: hideOnStartup
data.comment: Used for the hide on startup checkbox

data.name: hideWindow
data.comment: The caption for the button that hides the window. The character after the "&" is the hotkey that is used with the ALT key.

data.name: iconPackDownloadingMetadata
data.comment: Shown when downloading metadata for icon pack

data.name: iconPackDownloadingPack
data.comment: Shown when downloading an icon pack

data.name: iconPackPrompt
data.value: Vuoi installare il paccheto icone “{name}” (versione {version}) di {authorName}?
data.comment: Prompt shown when installing an icon pack

data.name: iconPackResetPrompt
data.value: Vuoi ripristinare le icone a quelle predefinite?
data.comment: Shown when asked to reset the icons

data.name: iconPackResetSuccess
data.value: Sono state ripristinate le icone predefinite
data.comment: Shown after icons were reset

data.name: iconPackSuccess
data.comment: Shown after an icon pack was installed successfully

data.name: keyChanged
data.comment: Used for the check boxes in the "Show notification when..." group box. "{0}" will be replaced with the key name

data.name: keyIsOff
data.comment: The text to display in the notification when a key is off. "{0}" will be replaced with the key name

data.name: keyIsOn
data.comment: The text to display in the notification when a key is on. "{0}" will be replaced with the key name

data.name: notificationSettings
data.comment: The caption for the button that opens the notification settings. The character after the "&" is the hotkey that is used with the ALT key.

data.name: notificationSettingsTitle
data.comment: The caption of the notification settings window

data.name: numLock
data.comment: The name of the num lock key

data.name: opacity
data.comment: The title for the "Opacity" group box

data.name: overlayPositionGroup
data.comment: The title for the "Overlay position" group box

data.name: permanentIndicator
data.comment: Text to display instead of the time if indicator overlay display is set to permanently.

data.name: reloadedIconsInfo
data.comment: Shown in a notification when hot-reloading icons.

data.name: saveAndCloseButton
data.comment: The caption for the "Save & Close" button. The character after the "&" is the hotkey that is used with the ALT key. Use two "&" to display a "&" character

data.name: scrollLock
data.comment: The name of the scroll lock key

data.name: searchForUpdatesOnResumeOption
data.comment: Label of options checkbox for update search after resume

data.name: settingsChangedToolTip
data.value: Le impostazioni sono state spostate! Ora le troverai nelle schede qui sopra!
data.comment: The tutorial tooltip shown when upgrading to 3.13.0.0

data.name: showIconsFor
data.comment: The title for the "Show icons for..." group box

data.name: showNoIcons
data.comment: The label for the check box that enables or disables all icons

data.name: showNoNotification
data.comment: The label for the check box that enables or disables all notifications

data.name: showNotificationWhen
data.comment: The title for the "Show notification when..." group box

data.name: showOverlayOnlyWhenActive
data.value: Visualizza sempre l'overlay quando è attiva
data.comment: The label for the check box that indicates whether overlay should only be shown when active

data.name: startOnLogon
data.comment: The label for the check box that enables or disabled the auto start.

data.name: tabAdvancedOptions
data.comment: Tab header for advanced options

data.name: tabGeneral
data.comment: Tab header for general settings

data.name: tabNotification
data.comment: Tab header for advanced settings

data.name: unsupportedCLI
data.value: Questa versione di CapsLock (versione {version}) non è supportata. Aggiorna alla versione più recente!
data.comment: Banner text when CLI version is unsupported

data.name: unsupportedWin
data.value: Stai usando {os} che non è più supportato da Microsoft. CapsLock in futuro abbandonerà il supporto per questo sistema operativo! Aggiorna Windows ad una versione più recente!
data.comment: Banner text when Windows version is unsupported

data.name: updateAvailable
data.comment: The title for the update window.

data.name: updateInfoFormat
data.comment: Displayed in the "Update Available" dialog. {0} is the version, {1} is the release date and time.

data.name: updateNow
data.comment: The caption for the "Update now" button. The character after the "&" is the hotkey that is used with the ALT key.
